translations.6747412884614451600: We are looking for feedback on the meaning of the surname, especially the choice of surname at the wedding. The survey will take 5-10 minutes to complete. If you wish, you can leave any answer blank that you do not wish to answer. We greatly appreciate your time!
translations.4186301301886430473: We have received your feedback. You can close the page now.
translations.3155113051076804049: I associate feelings and attributes like "protection", "love", or "mathematically gifted" with my family
translations.3707922390865066184: It is important to me what my friends think about my family
translations.1666650484088557644: My friends often call me by my family name or a nickname based on my family name
translations.3568955749586342676: It is important to me to have the same surname as my partner
translations.8212040851463122127: I would swap my surname for my partner's without hesitation
translations.5026909761614952415: I would be happy, if my siblings would keep our family name when getting married
translations.8884221513843364214: I think my family would be upset, if I would drop our family name
translations.5823208172309402420: I know at least one couple, who had a long discussion about their family name before their wedding
translations.6383197909131590142: How often have you used AI like ChatGPT
translations.4710302283435137320: I trust in answers given by AI like ChatGPT
translations.5280254839658832186: I enjoy to talk with an AI like ChatGPT
translations.8402960335706902073: If you have already married, what was the reasoning for your chosen surname?
translations.6974852674806303631: Anything else you wish to tell us?
